metadata.title: CVE-2018-10935 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the 389 Directory Server that allows users to cause acrash in the LDAP server using ldapsearch with server side sort.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
